summary: Quick roll-call: team members introduced themselves and stated availability/roles for today's work (PM to coordinate, Architect to surface blockers/architecture decisions, Developer to assist with implementation, QA to run tests when ready).

actions.task: Coordinate today's work and clarify priorities with the client
Monitor for any blockers and surface architecture decisions needed for the sprint
Support implementation and address development tasks as prioritized
Run QA checks when features/releases are ready for testing

risks.risk: Blockers or architectural issues may not be surfaced in time, delaying implementation.
risks.mitigation: Architect (Mike) to proactively monitor and escalate blockers; PM (Sarah) to facilitate quick decisions.

risks.risk: Features may reach QA late or without sufficient notice, causing testing bottlenecks.
risks.mitigation: Developers to notify QA (Jordan) as soon as work is ready; PM to enforce handoff notifications.
